700847f-a.text:
Dean Ave., south of the S.W. corner of Layton Ave.
About 1927.
W. B. Vernan.
700847f-a.folder: Dean Avenue & Layton Avenue, Bronx, NY

701397f-a.text:
Layton Ave., north side, east from Dean Ave., to its terminus on Eastchester Bay.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, as seen from Shore Drive (one block farther east). The Eureka Bathing Pavilion is at the N.E. corner of the aforementioned thoroughfares.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
701397f-a.folder: Layton Avenue & Dean Avenue, Bronx, NY
